price: (Rántí) ọjọ́ tí A máa mú àwọn àpáta rìn (kúrò ní àyè wọn). O sì máa rí ilẹ̀ tí ó máa fojú hàn (tí kò níí sí n̄ǹkan kan mọ́ lórí rẹ̀). A máa kó wọn jọ. A ò sì níí fi ẹnì kan sílẹ̀ nínú wọn.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نُسَيِّرُ ٱلۡجِبَالَ وَتَرَى ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَارِزَةٗ وَحَشَرۡنَٰهُمۡ فَلَمۡ نُغَادِرۡ مِنۡهُمۡ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma nusayyiru al-jibāla watarā al-arḍa bārizatan waḥasharnāhum falam nughādir min'hum aḥadan
